title: Clear night city driving with moderate speed, the ego vehicle is following a red car.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly in a city street at night, following a red car.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.9 m/s). There are 10 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is maintaining a safe distance from the red car in front of it. It is also prepared to slow down or stop if needed, as there are several pedestrians and parked cars nearby. The driver is being cautious due to the clear night conditions and the presence of other vehicles on the road.
